title: "Idle"-Status  when creating a game
body: Are you shown as "Idle" when you don't use the computer for 10min but create a normal game?

replies.body: The yellow icon should revert to green when you return to the client.  The same icon also appears when players are in game.  If you are experiencing issue where your icon is showing up as yellow despite activity, I'm curious what would happen if you clicked on your icon on your chat pane?  It should toggle between green and red.  If you are experiencing issue with a delay in your user status changing, please let me know and we can look into this a bit more.
